name: Avoid Open SQL SELECT queries without WHERE condition on XXL Tables
description:
This rule retrieves all ABAP artifacts using SELECT queries without WHERE clause on tables and views.
This rule is applied only on XXL tables

XXL tables are extremely large tables which contain a huge amount of data. The threshold that determines when a table is considered to contain a huge amount of data can be configured by the user.
output:
Associated to each ABAP Artifact with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The XXL SAP Table/View name
rationale: To reduce the number of data records to be transferred, for each SQL statement you must specify a WHERE clause that is as selective as possible. A SELECT statement without a WHERE condition is an indication of a design error in the program.
total: Number of ABAP Artifacts using XXL SAP Tables and XXL SAP Views.
alternativeName: Avoid Open SQL SELECT queries without WHERE condition on XXL Tables

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance

parameters.name: Minimum number of rows to consider a table as XXL
parameters.description: tables are considered as XXL if the number of rows is greater than this value
